item.title: Hello World
item.description: I’m a python developer by trade, so let’s say hello in python! print("Hello World")

item.title: About
item.description: This is the place where I share my thoughts and notes about things that I’m excited about and working on and hope to connect with people having a similar mindset. I’d love to hear from you!
